channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: What to know about federal ban threatening market for THC-infused drinks and snacks
item.description: THC-infused drinks and snacks have soared in popularity as alcohol sales have declined in recent years

item.title: US retailers are about to see if Black Friday benefits from a holiday halo effect
item.description: Black Friday bargains no longer tempt people to leave Thanksgiving tables for midnight mall runs

item.title: World shares are mixed in holiday-thinned trading with Wall Street closed for Thanksgiving
item.description: World shares are mixed in holiday-thinned trading as tech stocks slipped after a recent rebound lost steam

item.title: Robert A.M. Stern, noted American architect, dies at 86
item.description: Renowned architect Robert A.M. Stern, a prominent figure of American architecture from the 1980s through present day, has died

item.title: Winning numbers drawn in Wednesday’s Powerball
item.description: The winning numbers in Wednesday evening’s drawing of the "Powerball" game were: 07-08-15-19-28, Powerball: 3
